name: Sepia
description: Alex  Means, Sam Rigby, Grace Patton, Hunter Tollstrup, and Harmony Hankins made this game at Spy Hop Productions in the Power Up game design program, with Sam Cookson (Peer Mentor) and Liz Schulte (Mentor).  Power Up brings together teen artists, developers, and producers to collaborate on the creation of a game.  They meet twice a week, after-school hours, for five months. We hope you enjoy the game and learn something new about the film industry.
